mapper.select: SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId as shop_userId, sc.cid, sc.userId, sc.comment, (select SUM(good) from good where si.sid = sid) AS total_good, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid WHERE si.categoryId=${categoryId}

SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') AS openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') AS closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId, (select SUM(good) from good where si.sid = sid) AS total_good FROM shop_info AS si ORDER BY total_good desc limit 0, 5;

SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId as shop_userId, (select SUM(good) from good where sid = ${sid}) AS total_good, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost, sc.userId, sc.comment FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid WHERE si.sid = ${sid}

SELECT si.sid, si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, date_format(si.openTime,'%H:%i') as openTime, date_format(si.closeTime,'%H:%i') as closeTime, si.categoryId, si.userId, (select SUM(good) from good where si.sid = sid) AS total_good, sc.cid, sc.comment, sp.pfile, sp.pname, sp.cost FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_comments AS sc ON si.sid = sc.sid LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid WHERE si.userId = #{userId}
SELECT sid, userId, good FROM good WHERE sid = ${sid} AND userId = #{userId}

SELECt si.file, si.name, si.tel, si.addr, si.openTime, si.closeTime, (select SUM(good) from good where sid = si.sid) AS total_good, sp.pname FROM shop_info AS si LEFT OUTER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid WHERE si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%') OR si.tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%') OR si.addr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%') OR si.openTime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%') OR si.closeTime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%') OR sp.pname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word} ,'%')
SELECT sid, userId, good FROM good WHERE sid = ${sid} ORDER BY sid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_info(name, tel, addr, openTime, closeTime, categoryId, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, ${categoryId}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO shop_product(sid, pname, cost) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(sid) FROM shop_info), #{pname}, ${cost})
INSERT INTO shop_product(sid, pname, cost) VALUES (${sid}, #{pname}, #{cost})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_info SET name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, addr = #{addr}, openTime = #{openTime}, closeTime = #{closeTime}, categoryId = ${categoryId} WHERE sid = ${sid}

UPDATE good
good = 0
good = 1
WHERE sid = ${sid} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE si, sp FROM shop_info AS si INNER JOIN shop_product AS sp ON si.sid = sp.sid where si.sid = ${sid}
